byju's - Android Developer

Location - Noida, Work Type: Full time

It Java Kotlin July 01, 2022

What You'll Do:

  • Working knowledge of RxJava, Glide and Koin/Dagger
  • Basic understanding of Gradle, its types, structure and usage, Proguard and its usage
  • Passionate about the performance of the app, preferably having worked on improving the app metrics (start-up time, crash rate, frozen frames, etc)

What You'll Need:

  • A minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience in Android
  • Comfortable coding in both Java and Kotlin
  • Rock solid understanding of Android Activities, Fragments, Recycler View, Constraint layout and other basics of Android development
  • In-depth knowledge of data structures (Arrays. hashmaps, Linked lists)

What We're Offering:

  • An open, transparent culture. After all, we are together in it to Kotlin it :D
  • Latest, highest configuration machines to work on (and flaunt, if you may! The buzz has it that they look good on Insta stories! )
  • Quality over quantity approach (We care about the work you put into the hours, and not about the number of hours you put into work).
  • Frequent parties, trips, and sporting events.
  • A platform to showcase your non-technical skills. (if you can strum that guitar or belt out a classic, we will find you and make you perform :D )
  • Put forth your product ideas and see them manifested in our product.

P.S. We have a strong, proven bias towards people who demonstrate zeal to learn, a curiosity of how things work beneath the hood and are a good match for our open culture that promotes integrity, equality and learning
